description: At the town gates, a friendly inn with a family atmosphere in a fine building, with a pleasant veranda. Fish dishes prevail on the menu, featuring an interesting selection of oysters. At midday there is also an easier set menu.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
